description: Tracking file for all Python scripts in the backend
purpose: Maintains metadata for all Python scripts including creation dates, descriptions, and dependencies

description: Main FastAPI application entry point
purpose: Initializes and configures the FastAPI application with all routes and middleware

description: Global middleware components for the FastAPI application
purpose: Provides global middleware functionality for CORS, logging, and request processing

description: Minimal FastAPI server for development and testing
purpose: Provides a minimal server implementation for development dashboard testing

description: Authentication middleware for protecting API endpoints
purpose: Handles user authentication and authorization for API requests

description: Clerk authentication integration middleware
purpose: Integrates with Clerk authentication service for user management

description: Application configuration and environment settings
purpose: Manages application configuration, environment variables, and settings

description: Registry for all CAL-* calculation functions
purpose: Maintains registry of all calculation functions and provides access by CAL-ID

description: Multi-year financial projection engine
purpose: Executes multi-year financial projections using registered calculation functions

description: Personal income tax calculations (CAL-PIT-001, CAL-PIT-002, etc.)
purpose: Implements personal income tax calculation functions for different tax brackets and scenarios

description: Capital gains tax calculations (CAL-CGT-001, CAL-CGT-002)
purpose: Implements capital gains tax calculations with different CGT methods and exemptions

description: Superannuation calculations (CAL-SUP-002, CAL-SUP-003, etc.)
purpose: Implements superannuation contribution limits, tax calculations, and pension projections

description: Property-related financial calculations
purpose: Implements property investment calculations including rental yields and equity projections

description: Core calculation schemas for CalculationState and ProjectionOutput
purpose: Defines CalculationState and ProjectionOutput models used by all CAL functions

description: Entity schemas for persons, companies, trusts, and SMSFs
purpose: Defines data models for legal entities and persons in the calculation engine

description: Asset and liability schemas for financial positions
purpose: Defines asset, loan, and financial position models for the calculation engine

description: Cashflow schemas for income, expenses, and contributions
purpose: Defines cashflow models for income, deductions, and contribution flows

description: Orchestration schemas for LLM integration and scenario management
purpose: Defines schemas for scenario management and LLM orchestration integration

description: Complete calculation state schema definitions
purpose: Provides comprehensive schema definitions for calculation state management

description: Trace logging utilities for calculation functions
purpose: Provides utilities for adding trace entries to calculation results for debugging and explanation

description: Base SQLAlchemy models and database configuration
purpose: Provides base classes and database setup for all SQLAlchemy models

description: User profile database model
purpose: Defines the user profile data model for storing user information

description: Financial scenario database model
purpose: Defines the scenario data model for storing financial planning scenarios

description: Investment strategy database model
purpose: Defines the strategy data model for storing investment strategies

description: Advice outcome database model
purpose: Defines the advice outcome data model for storing advice results

description: Main API router aggregating all endpoint routes
purpose: Aggregates all API routes into a single router for the FastAPI application

description: LLM debug router for tiered routing visualization and testing
purpose: Provides debug endpoints for LLM tier candidates display and model selection testing in the development dashboard

description: Health check API endpoints
purpose: Provides health check endpoints for monitoring application status

description: Rule loading service for tax and financial rules
purpose: Loads and manages tax rules, superannuation rules, and other financial calculation rules

description: Scenario management service
purpose: Manages financial scenarios, including creation, storage, and execution

description: Service for loading and managing LLM prompts from catalog
purpose: Provides utilities for loading prompt text from files and accessing prompt metadata from the catalog system

description: Test script for calculation registry validation
purpose: Validates that all expected CAL-* calculation functions are properly registered

description: Simple test script for OpenRouter connection without full client setup
purpose: Tests basic OpenRouter API connectivity using direct HTTP calls

description: Comprehensive test script for OpenRouter client functionality
purpose: Tests full OpenRouter client functionality including model listing and chat completions

description: Test script to verify minimal server imports and basic functionality
purpose: Validates that the minimal server can import correctly and access calculation functions

description: Verification script to ensure OpenRouter implementation matches documentation
purpose: Verifies that our OpenRouter client implementation complies with the official API documentation

description: Alembic environment configuration for database migrations
purpose: Configures Alembic migration environment and database connections

description: Initial database migration creating all tables
purpose: Creates initial database schema with all required tables for the application

description: Development script to start the FastAPI server with environment loading
purpose: Convenient script to start the development server with proper environment setup and Clerk authentication checking

description: Integration test script that starts server and tests endpoints
purpose: End-to-end testing of server startup and API endpoint functionality including health, modes, and documentation endpoints

description: Test script to verify router imports and registration
purpose: Validates that API routers can be imported and contain expected routes for modes and general API functionality

description: Automated validation script for Python Scripts Rule compliance
purpose: Validates compliance with Python Scripts Rule including file locations, tracking completeness, and data integrity

description: Automated script tracking entry generator
purpose: Automatically generates and validates tracking entries for Python scripts to ensure rule compliance

description: Example frontend build script for testing type generation
purpose: Demonstrates a legitimate frontend Python script for build tooling that generates TypeScript types from backend schemas

description: OpenRouter LLM client with tiered routing and dynamic model selection
purpose: Provides robust HTTP client for OpenRouter API interactions with comprehensive error handling, rate limiting, and dynamic model selection via tiered routing

description: LLM service abstraction layer with connection testing and monitoring
purpose: High-level LLM service providing connection management, cost tracking, usage monitoring, and unified API for LLM operations

description: Utils package initialization
purpose: Initializes the utilities package for shared utility functions and helpers

description: LLM response parsing and validation utilities
purpose: Provides comprehensive parsing, validation, and processing utilities for LLM responses including JSON schema validation and structured data extraction

description: LLM Engine package initialization and exports
purpose: Initializes the LLM Engine package and provides unified exports for all LLM orchestration components

description: LLM Orchestrator base class with prompt loading and TraceLog integration
purpose: Provides base orchestration functionality for all LLM operations with CAL-* ID tracking and external prompt loading

description: State hydration engine for converting natural language to CalculationState
purpose: Converts natural language financial descriptions into structured CalculationState objects with validation and clarification question generation

description: Narrative generation engine for human-readable calculation explanations
purpose: Generates human-readable narratives from calculation results with multiple templates and confidence scoring

description: PII detection and redaction utilities for LLM data sanitization
purpose: Provides comprehensive PII filtering with configurable privacy levels and audit trails for secure LLM operations

description: Intent recognition engine for user query analysis and mode selection
purpose: Analyzes user queries to determine intent and select appropriate operational modes (1-26) from the four-engine architecture

description: Model registry service for dynamic OpenRouter model catalog management
purpose: Provides dynamic model catalog management with caching, refresh, and tier-based model selection for the LLM tiered routing strategy

description: LLM tier enums and selection criteria for the three intelligence tiers
purpose: Defines LLMTier enum (ROUTER, NARRATOR, THINKER) and ModelSelectionCriteria for tier-based model selection

description: OpenRouter API schemas for model information and capabilities
purpose: Defines Pydantic models for OpenRouter API responses including pricing, capabilities, and model selection results

description: Model registry schemas for cached model catalog management
purpose: Defines ModelRegistry and RegistryStatus models for caching and querying available OpenRouter models with tier mappings

description: Test script for model registry service with full dependencies
purpose: Tests the model registry service with full app dependencies, including model fetching and tier selection

description: Simple test for model registry components without network calls
purpose: Tests model registry schemas and tier selection logic using mocked HTTP client

description: Test script for model registry with real OpenRouter API calls
purpose: Tests the model registry service with real OpenRouter API calls to verify model fetching and caching

description: Simple parallel speed test for top 10 curated LLM models using direct HTTP calls
purpose: Tests response speeds for top 10 curated models in parallel, generating performance benchmark data for model selection

description: Sequential speed test for top 10 curated LLM models using OpenRouter client
purpose: Tests response speeds for top 10 curated models sequentially using the OpenRouter client, generating performance benchmark data
